questions.answer: The Klingon script is a substitution of the characters of the Latin alphabet by their Klingon symbol. Example: a is written  There are some exceptions like poly-characters substitution ch, ng, gh or tlh Example: tlh is written as  English words must be translated into Klingon to keep the original language spirit. Example: tlhIngan maH translates We are Klingon
